body_html: Also trying to do the same... I think it's safe to say that there are many others who haven't chimed in but would love for this to be added, or documented steps so that we can implement it ourselves. Are we at least on the right path to use export_meta_graph and Saver.save() to convert the retrained .pb and label files into the metagraph def and checkpoint files needed for TF serving?
